name: C-lone (Games@MQ)
description: C-Lone is a 2D puzzle-platformer game. You play as “C” who is a cloning test subject trying to escape from a cloning facility. You do this by navigating through the various levels by completing puzzles in combination with your platforming skills to reach and unlock the exit door. The caveat however, is that the levels contain multiple Clones and moving “C”  will also move the rest of your Clones. Master controlling the multiple Clones simultaneously, using each of them to your advantage to progress through the levels.
